metadata.description:
gm

I’m serboy. I’m a musician and producer from Istanbul, Turkey. I’m originally from Ankara where Joe Strummer was born (punks not dead!) and the first artist from Turkey on Sound. It’s a great honor to be here!

My girlfriend introduced me to NFTs back in November 2021, so I started to study them because I had nothing else to do. I had lost my job and my home in my hometown just before the pandemic. When the first moment I understood the idea, I thought to myself “we should combine this with music!” And started to search for a home for my unreleased genreless tracks. I’ve been writing, recording, producing, mixing all my songs since I graduated from a music production school in 2014 and before that, I spent my time learning how to make music that I don’t want to :) Then I found Sound a couple weeks before Reo dropped “Light Show” and that was the moment I believed in Music NFTs. So glad today I’m here, making amazing friends and making history with incredibly talented people all around web3 and we’re just getting started.

I believe songs are always here, waiting for artists to tell the story to the world with one common language, Music.
So I love to let the sounds speak to you.
“Crazy” is a gift to the love of my life.
metadata.name: CRAZY #1
metadata.title: CRAZY
